body: ive been getting into hardstyle music lately and i would like to see peoples playlist, not just hardstyle it can  be any genre like rap, hiphop, trap or even country (ew)

title: Music Playlist

replies.body:
My playlist includes mostly trap music, and electronic music.
Here is the link to my Trap Playlist:
http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLb0ROitIFR3Dk9WBdff0B0v1hv0W5SkGZ
And to my channel which has all my other playlists:
https://m.youtube.com/channel/UCs4wCe3uGiO7WntDyjZb2mQ
I hope you like them! :)
